attributes.action: change the time system GMT/BST to CET (Central European Time)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK currently moves clocks forward to British Summer Time (GMT+1) and back again for Greenwich Mean Time (GMT), We want the UK to change our time zone in line with the rest of Central Europe so that the UK can reduce the impact of CO2 emissions, but more importantly so that we can reduce the lighter mornings which come to waste and replace it for lighter evenings.
